metadata.title: CVE-2023-52706 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: gpio:sim: fix a memory leak Fix an inverted logic bug in gpio_sim_remove_hogs()that leads to GPIO hog structures never being freed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
